description: This recipe takes the&nbsp;traditional julep and adds a tart&nbsp;cranberry syrup made with 100% pure, unsweetened juice. The sweet-tart balance is perfect for those who are new to&nbsp;mezcal because it smooths out some of its smoky flavors while still keeping them present in this drink!
name: Basil Cranberry Julep
